Q_DESC:
To write a program which a user can interchange the two Adjacent Nodes given a circular Linked List.
After creating the first node the user has to enter 1 for entering another node or 0 for finishing the entry of nodes.
Now the user has to enter the node position in which it has to be inter changed in the linked list.
INPUT:
1 // first element
1 //want to input more elements(1->YES)
2 //second element
1 //want to input more elements(1->YES)
3 //third element
1 //want to input more elements(1->YES)
4 //fourth element
0 //no need to inpput more element(0->NO)
2  //position to be interchanged
OUTPUT:
Displaying the list elements
1 2 3 4 
After interchanging, Displaying the list elements
1 3 2 4
TESTCASE_1:
1 1 2 1 3 1 4  0 2 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Displaying the list elements
1 2 3 4 
After interchanging, Displaying the list elements
1 3 2 4
TESTCASE_2:
69 1 23 1 48 1 34 1 77 0 4 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Displaying the list elements
69 23 48 34 77 
After interchanging, Displaying the list elements
69 23 48 77 34
TESTCASE_3:
66 1 77 1 88 1 99 1 77 1 11 1 22 0 5 
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Displaying the list elements
66 77 88 99 77 11 22 
After interchanging, Displaying the list elements
66 77 88 99 11 77 22
